Project.shortdesc: e-Portfolios are a step towards learner-centred, self-directed, peer-to-peer education and personal learning environments (PLEs). The myWORLD project will test e-portfolios software in 10 education, training and development sites, and evaluate these case studies and their impact on learners and institutions.
Project.name: myWORLD - Wider Opportunities for Reflection, Learning and Development
